docs.snippet: The Republican Party is one that espouses the virtues of limited government, but this year’s group of presidential candidates is treading carefully as a standoff between authorities and armed antigovernment protesters in Oregon drags on....
docs.abstract: The Republican Party is one that espouses the virtues of limited government, but this year’s group of presidential candidates is treading carefully as a standoff between authorities and armed antigovernment protesters in Oregon drags on.

headline.main: Republican Candidates Tread Carefully to Oregon Protest Standoff

docs.snippet: Jeb Bush's recent cancellation of advertising plans in Iowa and South Carolina was yet another cost-saving step for a down-in-the-polls presidential campaign that had already thinned its staff. If not for his flush super PAC, the Republican might ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Jeb Bush's recent cancellation of advertising plans in Iowa and South Carolina was yet another cost-saving step for a down-in-the-polls presidential campaign that had already thinned its staff. If not for his flush super PAC, the Republican might be gone from the contest by now.

headline.main: Cash-Rich Super PACs Prolong Flagging Presidential Campaigns
headline.print_headline: Cash-Rich Super PACs Prolong Flagging Presidential Campaigns

docs.snippet: Some Iranians are wondering whether Saudi Arabia has again gained the upper hand in a new diplomatic crisis....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some Iranians are wondering whether Saudi Arabia has again gained the upper hand in a new diplomatic crisis.
docs.abstract: Iran finds itself caught in new crisis triggered by Saudi state execution of Shiite dissident Sheikh Nimr al-Nimr at time when it hoped to move beyond international sanctions and become accepted global player; nation might have benefited from worldwide anger at Saudi executions, but instead is again portrayed by opponents as provocateur after Saudi Embassy in Tehran is attacked by angry protesters.

headline.main: Iran, Emerging From Sanctions, Faces Crisis After Saudi Arabia Embassy Attack
headline.print_headline: Iran, Emerging From Sanctions, Faces New Crisis

byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta contributed reporting from New York, and Ben Hubbard from Baghdad.
